We will be giving our 7 minute presentation and a presentation on what we think might be the other team's argument (based on the citations they have given us). \n\nWe want you to come and tear our argument apart to help us identify the weaknesses- it won't kill us, it will only make us stronger!\n\nFor more information, contact Meaghan Pimsler (mlpimsler@gmail.com)."}
